name: ALGOL
description: ALGOL is a deflationary token with a total supply of 50 trillion. Its tokenomics is aimed to reward holders. For every buy or sell operation 1% is burned, 7% is reflected to holders (a form of passive staking), 4% is added to LP and 1% to a special wallet used for charity,general distribution,airdrop and (if needed) additional burning. Launched 21/01/22.
